title: MoonRAG
description: A Python RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) application that uploads documents to AWS S3, creates an AWS Bedrock Knowledge Base with OpenSearch Serverless as the vector database, and provides a CLI chatbot interface. - Upload files from local directory to S3 - Create OpenSearch Serverless collection for vector…

title: PDFProcessor
description: Dockerized full-stack app: React (Vite) frontend, FastAPI backend, Redis (with Streams) datastore, and a worker for async PDF processing. - PDF upload & parsing: Choose PyPDF (text extraction per page), Google Gemini 2.0 Flash (extract and convert to Markdown), or Mistral OCR (per-page Markdown via Mistral; summary…
